IX.iii.1.D.5.g
.
Applying the End-of-the-Month Rule
Apply the end-of-the-month rule when reducing or discontinuing an award if a parent receives an additional amount of retirement income solely as the result of a legislated increase or COLA and not by reason of a change in the amount waived.
DIC cases that are discontinued may be reinstated on the basis of a revised waiver.
